headline: Newmont signs $795m deal to sell Éléonore gold mine in Canada to Dhilmar
summary: The sale forms part of Newmont's efforts to divest non-core assets, which have now surpassed its initial $2bn target.

raw.headline: Newmont signs $795m deal to sell Éléonore gold mine in Canada to Dhilmar
raw.summary: The sale forms part of Newmont's efforts to divest non-core assets, which have now surpassed its initial $2bn target.

headline: GDX: Free Cash Flow Revival Offers Hope
summary: VanEck Gold Miners ETF has failed to outperform gold prices, despite a strong rise over the past year. Click for more on GDX.
